title: Horror Transplant | Hands of a Stranger (Thriller, 1962) by Newt Arnold | Colorized Movie

sources.title: Horror Transplant | Hands of a Stranger (Thriller, 1962) by Newt Arnold | Colorized Movie
sources.description:
His new hands had a mind of their own, that of a killer!
A concert pianist loses his hands in a car crash, but a surgeon gives him new ones. The experimental medical procedure goes awry when the new hands drive the pianist mad.

Original title: Hands of a Stranger (1962) AKA: The Answer
Subtitles are available in many languages. 

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/oKF3iwROmZY


Director & Writer: Newt Arnold 
Stars: Paul Lukather, Joan Harvey, James Noah 
Genres: Colorized classics, Cult Film,  Horror, Thriller
